entry.title: Tirunelveli Halwa – The Taste of Tradition
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shanti Sweets
Type: Veg
Price: 190.00

This product contains Dairy items and cannot be shipped to EU and UK

Discover the authentic taste of Tirunelveli Halwa, a renowned delicacy that hails from the historic city of Tirunelveli in Tamil Nadu, India.

The halwa was first prepared by Rajput cooks hired by the zamindar of Chokkampatti, a village near Tirunelveli. Enchanted by the sweets he tasted in Kasi, the zamindar insisted that Jegan Singh’s family make them in his palace. Later, Singh moved to Tirunelveli. The water from the Thamirabarani River is also said to give the halwa its distinctive taste.

Ingredients: Wheat juice, Sugar, Ghee, Cashewnut.

Shelf life:20days

Serving Guide :Halwa can also be warmed up for a few seconds before serving for a softer texture

entry.title: Muscoth Halwa-மஸ்கோத் அல்வா
entry.summary:
Vendor: Thangaiya Sweets
Type: Veg
Price: 210.00

This product contains Dairy items and cannot be shipped to EU and UK

Buy Authentic Muscoth Halwa Online – Traditional Sweet from Tamil Nadu

What is Muscoth Halwa?

Muscoth Halwa is a unique and flavorful sweet originating from Mudalur, Tamil Nadu. This delicious halwa is made using pure coconut milk, wheat, and jaggery, giving it a rich, chewy texture and natural sweetness. It is a must-try delicacy for those who love traditional Indian sweets with a twist.

Why is Muscoth Halwa Special?

  • Made with pure coconut milk for a creamy, aromatic taste.
  • Chewy, melt-in-the-mouth texture with a glossy finish.
  • A heritage sweet from the town of Mudalur, with a legacy of over 100 years.
  • No artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring an authentic taste.

Why Choose Pettikadai for Muscoth Halwa?

At Pettikadai, we bring you Muscoth Halwa straight from its place of origin, ensuring freshness and authenticity. Here's why our halwa stands out:
✔ Sourced from traditional sweet makers in Mudalur
✔ Handcrafted with high-quality ingredients
✔ Freshly packed and delivered to your doorstep
✔ Perfect for gifting and special occasions

Ingredients of Muscoth Halwa

✅ Pure Coconut Milk
✅ Wheat Extract
✅ Jaggery / Sugar
✅ Cardamom for Flavor
✅ Ghee for Richness

How to Store Muscoth Halwa?

  • Keep it in an airtight container to maintain freshness.
  • Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
  • Shelf Life: 15-20 days (when stored properly).

Order Muscoth Halwa Online – A Taste of Tradition

Indulge in the authentic taste of Muscoth Halwa, a time-honored sweet loved across generations. Order now from Pettikadai and enjoy the richness of Tamil Nadu's famous halwa delivered to your home!
